data.lyric:
[ti:She Got the Best of Me]
[ar:Luke Combs]
[al:This One’s for You Too (Deluxe Edition)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]She Got the Best of Me - Luke Combs
[00:03.56]Lyricist：Luke Combs/Rob Snyder/Channing Wilson
[00:07.13]Composer：Luke Combs/Rob Snyder/Channing Wilson
[00:10.70]Producer：Scott Moffatt
[00:14.27]Seventeen you don't think that much about life
[00:17.02]
[00:18.22]You just live it
[00:19.16]
[00:20.39]Like kerosene dancing around a fire
[00:23.42]
[00:24.49]But you're in it
[00:26.29]So you jump right in
[00:28.20]
[00:29.30]Ain't afraid to fall
[00:31.85]And you give it all
[00:33.07]
[00:35.19]She got the best of me
[00:36.79]
[00:39.05]She broke my heart
[00:40.91]
[00:41.45]Now all that's left of me
[00:43.07]
[00:45.27]Is beating in this guitar
[00:47.45]
[00:48.57]Every night a different sound
[00:51.58]She follows me around
[00:53.20]
[00:53.86]So you get what's left of me
[00:55.65]
[00:57.17]Yeah you get what's left of me
[00:58.86]
[01:00.63]She got the best of me
[01:02.23]
[01:08.17]I picked myself up off the floor
[01:10.73]And found something new worth living for
[01:13.11]
[01:14.19]And a old dusty hand me down six string
[01:17.34]
[01:18.66]And a couple chords
[01:20.19]I'm getting over her
[01:22.29]
[01:23.23]A little more with every song
[01:25.58]So sing a long
[01:26.69]
[01:29.23]She got the best of me
[01:30.64]
[01:32.97]She broke my heart
[01:34.89]
[01:35.49]Now all that's left of me
[01:37.10]
[01:39.22]Is beating in this guitar
[01:41.10]
[01:42.72]Every night a different sound
[01:45.57]She follows me around
[01:47.31]
[01:48.06]So you get what's left of me
[01:49.74]
[01:51.24]Yeah you get what's left of me
[01:52.90]
[01:54.85]She got the best of me
[01:56.14]

[02:08.81]
